bill_title: direct the implementation of the requirements of certain provisions regarding nonmeandered waters.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to direct the implementation of the requirements of certain provisions regarding nonmeandered waters. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-23 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The provisions of this chapter shall be liberally construed to ensure that the public use of any water overlying private property are implemented consistent with the intent of the Legislature and that private property is respected. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
